name: World Bioenergy Association
goal:
Promote the sustainable utilisation of biomass globally and to support the business environment for bioenergy.

WBA woks with companies, associations, individuals in the activities of: knowledge transfer by publication of factsheets, statistics reports, mission reports, newsletters etc.; technology transfer via our online equipment directory platform; and capacity building by assisting in the setting up of national associations or branch offices all over the world.

WBA is a member driven organisation with more than 240 members representing 60 countries. We assist our members in identifying new markets, improving networking opportunities, provide ready access to latest news about bioenergy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy Union for Europe
EU's Common Agricultural Policy
Tackling Climate Change in European Union
The Clean Air Package
Sustainability
Renewable Energy Directive
EU Transport Policy
